channel.title: PHP Server Status Checker?
channel.description:
I've been trying to find a WORKING one for 3 hours now.
A simple PHP script (Or JavaScript script) that checks if your server is online or offline, and displays "Online" or "Offline"
I've seen it on some server's websites, and I do not want to have to use the one from MoparScape or Rune-Server etc, because I want multiple ones for different ports..
It seems simple, but I cannot find a working one. I have tried about every script possible to be found on Google and none of them work. Please do not post if you do not have a working script that you have proven to yourself that it works.
Thanks for any help. I will Rep

item.title: PHP Server Status Checker?
item.dc:creator: @ForeverPkers ForeverPkers
item.description:

I’ve been trying to find a WORKING one for 3 hours now.
